Time with mocking capability via [timefuzz][]

**BEWARE: VERY ALPHA**

Package API:

```{r echo=FALSE, comment=NA, results="asis"}
cat(paste(" -", paste(sprintf("`%s`", getNamespaceExports("clock")), collapse = "\n - ")))
```

## Installation

```{r eval=FALSE}
remotes::install_github("ropenscilabs/clock")
```

```{r}
library("clock")
```

## usage

```{r}
clock(2009)$time
clock(2009, 3, 13)$time
clock(2009, 3, 13, 1, 4, 53)$time
```

```{r}
x <- clock()
x$now()
x$utc()
x$now("UTC")
```

```{r}
clock_now()
clock_now("UTC")
```
